#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<set>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int cases;
    cin>>cases;
    while(cases>0){
    map<char,int> hole;
    hole['A'] = 1;
    hole['B'] = 2;
    hole['D'] = 1;
    hole['O'] = 1;
    hole['P'] = 1;
    hole['Q'] = 1;
    hole['R'] = 1;
    int count = 0;
    char s[1001];
    scanf("%s",s);
    for(int i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++){
        if(hole.find(s[i])!=hole.end()){
            count=count + hole[s[i]];
        }
    }
    cout<<count<<"\n";
    cases--;
    } 
    return 0;
}
